review: If you are a "cord cutter" who is looking to ditch cable like more and more people are looking to do, this product is for you.The build of this box is superb. It is very sturdy feeling, and compact in size. The inputs in the rear hold cables very snug. The remote is light and doesn't need to be pointed directly at the box. In fact, I have the actual box inside of an entertainment center cabinet and never have to touch it.The Fire TV couldn't be easier to use. You simply plug the thing in, follow the quick tutorial, and it's ready. It comes pre-installed with your Amazon account information. The controls are super simple and the menu is laid out intuitively. The voice command is really handy as well.Overall, I highly recommend the Fire TV to anyone looking to replace, or even supplement, their cable TV. It is a fantastic product, especially for the price.
author: B. Cook
